details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.7 Character encodings - Symbolic TrueType fonts
details.description: All symbolic TrueType fonts shall not specify an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

rule.description: All symbolic TrueType fonts shall not specify an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

error.message: A symbolic TrueType font specifies an Encoding entry in its dictionary
